name: from-fed-to-chain
description: Streamlined content pipeline: Review → Translation → TTS → Social Hooks (Manual Publishing)

scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:flutter
scripts.test:flutter: cd app && flutter test --coverage && lcov --summary coverage/lcov.info && dart run scripts/coverage_check.dart
scripts.format: npm run format:js && npm run format:dart
scripts.lint: npm run lint:node && npm run lint:flutter
scripts.precommit:test: cd app && dart format --set-exit-if-changed lib/ test/ && (flutter analyze --no-congratulate || exit_code=$?; if [ ${exit_code:-0} -le 1 ]; then exit 0; else exit $exit_code; fi) && flutter test
scripts.verify:precommit-ci-alignment: echo '✅ Verifying pre-commit and CI alignment...' && npm run precommit:test && echo '✅ Pre-commit checks match CI quality gates'
